name: Space Survival PuDou The Survivor
description:
It is a small indie, top down, 2d pixel , RPG, Survival, shooting game. You'll be controlling and protecting PuDou from dying, gain maximum EXP (to level up), score, boost and survival time.

==  (ONLY few people can exceed 10 min survival time!) ==

- PuDou has EXP, weapon refill speed, movement speed (player speed), and life capacity (max life gain).

- Each weapon have various traits and their own speciality.

- The longer survival time, the more challanges you'll be facing - giant boss, turret, bullet resistant 

alian tree, pot hole traps, faster monsters, laser beam, explosive floor, and more.

- Do you Live Or Survive? Come check it out!

- The game has 'Trick or Treat' surprise boxes, you can collect them by colliding with them. 

  See what surprises and boost you'll collect from 'Trick or Treat' surprise boxes! (more than 10 posibilities)

The programming part is 100% python made.

Assets were made with photoshop.

(Choose any link to download - google drive link or link from itch)
